node.html: • Creating a custom software to make advance payment for the office of Directorate of Advisory, Extension and Research Services (DAERS)
• Working as a student research intern in Xu Lab of Computational Biology Department, Carnegie Mellon University.
• Worked in Big Data Intelligence (BDI) Lab under Shubhra Kanti Karmaker, Assistant Professor, Auburn University, Alabama on Short Text Stream Clustering
• Worked with a team that developed a new sales forecasting model for Unilever Bangladesh
